website_summaries.verdict: The OluKai Inana is a mesh walking shoe designed for a wide range of activities. It is constructed to keep the foot comfortable while going on adventures on foot. The outsole is made of a Wet-Grip rubber that won’t let you slip even on wet rocks. The Inana is aptly named as it will inspire you to keep moving and trying out new things.
pros: Most of the owners laud how comfortable they feel whenever they have the OluKai Inana on
The bungee laces make this pair of walking shoes easy to put on and remove, says plenty of users
A lot of people love the Drop-In Heel feature because it makes it versatile in look and function
Many individuals are delighted that they can wear this model in and out of the water as it dries rather quickly
Despite looking a bit bulky, a bunch of folks were surprised that this footgear doesn’t weigh much
The Inana’s sporty design earned it lots of fans
cons: Several consumers share the same sentiments that compared to other OluKai shoes, the Inana runs short and narrow

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I love their other shoes, however, these shoes ran just a touch small so I had to go up a half size from my normal size in their shoes. Super comfy
customer_reviews.author: philip cowden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect casual boat shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears a size 12, problem is he has a narrow foot. He is a doctor and is on his feet all day. These shoes give him so much support and comfort we haven’t been back to the orthopedic surgeon since. This shoe also works great for a boat shoe. I have ordered him 2 blue pairs. I have never seen my husband more pleased with clothing/shoes ever!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Try putting them on your feet.
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight, breathable and comfortable. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: This runs narrow!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several size 12 Olukai shoes. This one, labeled a 12 is so much snugger than the other ones. All are listed as a USM12. Also, compared to the other ones this one is super lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago-Dave

customer_reviews.title: Bummer they're not like the Slipper style 😢
customer_reviews.text: OLUKIA slides are my favorite. I wear then year round, even in the winter. Therefore, I really had my hopes up for these shoes. Unfortunately, these shoes aren't nearly as wide as the Sandals are. I ordered a size 14 and couldn't get my fit in the last 1/3... Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Big Sxxy

customer_reviews.title: Need half size 12s
customer_reviews.text: !2s too small and 13s too big. Nice looking shoes though!
customer_reviews.author: WHG

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold up to wear
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair of Olukai shoes that disappointed me. Although they fit well and were comfortable, the upper mesh started to tear away from the rubber toe box on both the right and left shoes. As I said the fit was good from heel to toe and the toe box I felt was just right, they didn't last 4 months. Going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Not so wide
customer_reviews.text: Most Olukai shoes run wide, which is what I need. These looked good, but too narrow for my foot. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: MTB Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Olukai Shoes Are The Best
customer_reviews.text: Another excellent shoe that fits perfectly and looks good. Works with shorts or long pants. I’m a fan that highly recommends Olukai.
customer_reviews.author: Rationalfears

customer_reviews.title: Quality with style.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! I have 6 or more pairs of Olukai’s and these have the best arch support! They also make incredible flip flops.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy Them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Very comfortable and breathable summer shoes. Fashionable and have received several compliments on the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: great shoes, love the slide in back. they run a tab slim on the arch but i am sure that will stretch out. I will be buying another pair!!
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Met my expectations for comfort. I expect the best in my footwear products.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. Lightweight and breathable. I own two pairs. I’ve worn them with socks and without, work both ways. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: EZ on the feet.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit socks or no socks; a massage for your feet. A great casual shoe that works on the beach or the street.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Renn

customer_reviews.title: To large
customer_reviews.text: Review said they run small so I ordered the next size. They were to large.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another hit by Olukai
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad looking shoe. Feels great when walking. You can wear socks or not. Your choice.
customer_reviews.author: Brad C.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and easy on and off makes these an great daily shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and easy on and off makes these an great daily shoe.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: do not fit like the other shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are narrower and the toe box is smaller than the other Olukai shoes models. Also pretty stiff shoe. Had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great wide sizes!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Well made shoes. With cool sizes for wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Steven I

customer_reviews.title: 🤙
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. The fit, look feel are so cool. Feel like I’m a surfer in Hawaii !
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Barry

customer_reviews.title: Lacking good comfort
customer_reviews.text: Not a really comfortable shoe but looks good on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: J Axton

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes supporting a good cause!
customer_reviews.text: Like, form fitting shoe. My second pair. Wish they were America made.
customer_reviews.author: Crazyfingers

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the color,the way they fit and they are very light weight .
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: The shoe size is not US standardized. The size 11 is actually a size 9. Very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: rod palmer

product_meta.title: OLUKAI Inana Water Shoe - Men's
product_meta.description: Hawai‘i’s lifeguards often practice a less-is-more lifestyle, training all year to stay fit and healthy. With this in mind, we imagined our new ‘Inana shoe to be athletic, functional and downright ruggedly handsome. The streamlined, one-piece mesh upper is paired with a ‘Wet Grip Rubber’ outsole featuring a barnacle-inspired lugged design for exceptional traction in wet and dry environments. ‘INANA (ee-nah-nah) TRANSLATION Active, Lively
feature_bullets: UPPER: A functional, one piece open mesh upper with a custom cut foam backer and no-sew welded TPU overlays for a seamless fit. Minimally lined with a breathable single layer mesh.
FOOTBED: Dual-density anatomical EVA footbed provides excellent support and cushion. Hydrophobic and perforated to save weight and shed water. Removable and washable.

OUTSOLE: Lightweight, compression molded EVA midsole with drainage ports that encapsulate the heel. Non-marking ‘Wet-Grip Rubber’ outsole with lugged pod design inspired by a cluster of barnacles for superior traction on wet and dry surfaces.
FEATURES: Tested and approved by the HLA, our patented Drop-In Heel design offers both a slide and shoe functionality, embroidered logos and a lace toggle for easy on/off function.
